_header: Saint Kenelm the young king that holy martyr is
Subjects: saints’ lives; Kenelm, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Kenelm in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
Sein kenelm þe ȝonge kyng þat holi martir isKyng he
                    was of engelond of þe marche of walis…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou god uor seynt kenelms loue is swete grace us
                    sendeþat we mote to þulke Ioie þat he is Inne
                    wende

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint kenelme þe ȝonge kyng þat holy marter isKyng
                    he was of ingelond of þe march of Walis…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& marye mayde & modir bryȝt of ble þou praye
                    þy swete soneþat we mot also þorw þe in heuene ryche to
                    wone

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEint kenelm þe ȝongue kyng þat holi martyr isHe was
                    kyng in Engelonde of þe Marche of Walis…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Nov god for þe loue of Seint Kenelm is swete grace it
                    sendeÞat we moten to þulke Ioie þare he is inne i
                    wiende
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 344-55.
Bennett,  Jack Arthur Walter,  and  G. V. Smithers, eds.  
             Early Middle English Verse and Prose.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1966: 97-107.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Kenelm þe ȝong ling þat god martir isKing was
                    in engelond of þe marche of Walis…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Now god for seint Kenelmes loue His suete grace vs
                    sendeÞat we mote to þilke Ioye þat he is inne
                    wende
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Kenelm þe ȝonge kyng þat holy Martyr isKyng he
                    was in Engelonde of þe March of Walys…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now god ffor Seint Kenelmes loue his swete grace vs
                    sendeÞat we mote come to heuene blisse after oure lyues
                    ende

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint kenelme þe ȝong king þat holy marter wasking
                    he was of englond of þe marche he was…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…Now god for seint kenelmes loue his swete grace ous
                    sendeþat we mote to þulke Ioie come þat his saule
                    wende

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEyn kenelm þe ȝong king þat oure lordes martir
                    isking he was of engelond of þe Marche of Walis…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…Nou god for sein kenelmes loue his swete grace vs
                    sendeþat we mote to þat Ioye þat he is Inne y
                    wende

De sancto kenelmo (f. 121, by scribe in margin beside first line);

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Kenelyne þe ȝong king an holy marter isA king he
                    was of Engelond of þe marche of walis…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Now god for þe loue of Seint Kenelyne his swete grace vs
                    sendeÞat we mowe come to þat Ioye þer he is without
                    ende
